## SystemDependentResponse type

A response that is dependent on a system state such as if the user has linked their account.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type SystemDependentResponse<T = string | ResponseOutput> = SystemDependable<SimpleResponse<T>>;
```
<b>References:</b> [ResponseOutput](./stentor-models.responseoutput.md)<!-- -->, [SystemDependable](./stentor-models.systemdependable.md)<!-- -->, [SimpleResponse](./stentor-models.simpleresponse.md)
